metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13397 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FreeRDP before 2.1.1. An out-of-bounds (OOB) read vulnerability has been detected in security_fips_decrypt in libfreerdp/core/security.c due to an uninitialized value.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13397` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp-x11 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-cache1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-client1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4

criterions.comment: freerdp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4').
